formalpara.title: Figure 7. Mixed switch regulation and substrate dependent pathway: programmed cell death
formalpara.para: An example of a mixed pathway. Some signal controls activities of either ced-9 or ced-3 and ced-4, resulting in activation of a pathway by which cells die. Inactivation of ced-9 results in extra cells dying. Inactivation of either ced-3 or ced-4 results in the survival of cells that would otherwise die. Inactivation of ced-1, ced-2, etc. results in cells that die, but whose corpses are not engulfed by surrounding tissue.
